patterns: how many courses are there in this college
responses:
Poornima University has many course availbe, 
courses are:

1.B.Tech(CE,CS,AIDS)

2.B.Tech(EE,ME)

3.BCA(genral,CS,AIDS)

4.B.sc

5.BBA (Marketing) 

6.BBA (Accounting & Finance)

7.PIHM

patterns: how long will it take to complete course
responses: Our college offers 4 year long B.Tech course and 3 long BCA and BBA course.

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: Poornnima University is located, Ramchandrapura P.O. Vidhani Vatika Road Sitapura,Jaipur, Rajasthan.

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 6 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
Academic Level 12th passed and 75% or above in PCM (theory and practical) for B.tech.
For BCA In 12th from any stream and 65% and above.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be six or seven classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour and Lab will be of 2 hour.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of India. We adopt a British teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.

There are assignments,Lab recrod,practical these all carry marks for written exam . The assignments and Lab records have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.There also written exam in 3 parts CIE-1, Mid sem and End sem
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Lakshay, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court,Football ground,American Football Ground, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen,Library, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
